CustomField.description: Determine if grant addresses COVID response and, if so, if it is within and/or outside of COVID strategy.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Response required for all grants. Choose within strategy for any COVID fund grants, choose outside strategy for any COVID-response grants funded through other means.
CustomField.label: Does this grant address COVID response?

value.fullName: Yes, through COVID strategy AND outside of COVID strategy
value.label: Yes, through COVID strategy AND outside of COVID strategy
